channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - Databases

item.title: SAI and N-O-SQL
item.description:
Yesterday (argh, the day before yesterday) I went to a SAI conference on nosql. In Belgium, SAI is a non-profit organization for IT people which focuses on knowledge sharing.

The conference that day was on nosql. The presentation given by OuterThought was very good and offered a nice introduction to â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
